title: CrackShot插件自定义枪械格式问题
author: 幻若浅梦
txt_content:
我自定义了一个武器，但是不能在游戏里显示出来，求解决
密藏:
    Item_Information:
        Item_Name: "&e"
        Item_Type: 418
        Item_Lore: "&e武器类型:  霰弹|&b&l==========================|&e攻击:20|&e子弹:21|&e等级：★★★★★☆&b&l=========================="
        Sounds_Acquired: BAT_TAKEOFF-1-1-0
    Shooting:
        Right_Click_To_Shoot: true
        Cancel_Left_Click_Block_Damage: true
        Cancel_Right_Click_Interactions: true
        Projectile_Amount: 1
        Delay_Between_Shots: 20
        Projectile_Type: snowball
        Projectile_Flames: false
        Projectile_Damage: 20

replies.author: asd45.
replies.txt_content:
